text: Finally @h5bp 3.0 is out of the door http://t.co/RSFftniD Big thanks to @necolas for much of the work - especially cleaning for up the docs.
To test in Chrome for Android you need SDK,Chrome & USB-connected phone http://t.co/XZTB8M65 or just use Opera Emulator http://t.co/7vUsR7Rp
Aww @beverloo speaks about Open Web Platform in Chrome for Android video http://t.co/inPSd2WK
Speaking of prefixes, I found: http://t.co/JzVXSzBN (view in Opera, after enabling opera:config#debug%20skin) full list http://t.co/GGcWh3Lf
why, we just need to wear veils now. Apparently a 'woman on the phone' implies sexism http://t.co/DURBKnuk
This is awesome. @zcorpan is documenting and speccing quirks mode behavior to be consistent across all browsers http://t.co/VUNVHMkP
